name: splahlunking
description:
1 - 4 players compete online to collect as much treasure as they can and survive! the deeper you go the more valuable the treasure to collect, but be sure to remember your route in case your equipment fails. grab air bubbles and special powerups to help you win. submit scores for your single player attempts! full leaderboards here.

controls:

  • wasd/arrow keys: move
  • x /enter: taunt/select
  • r : return to character select on end
  • esc: back/quit
  • m: mute music
  • f1-f4: change window scale

*multiplayer: for hosting a game you will need to forward UDP on port 22122. for LAN play you will need to join using the host's local IP.  

source, bug reports, and more info on github.

@xhiggy
